title: FS: T213-2 Two Name Johnson-Lajoie PRICE REDUCED 8/3 - $500
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: FS: T213-2 Two Name Johnson-Lajoie PRICE REDUCED 8/3 - $500
posts.post_content:
Picked up this nice two different name card, and both are hall of fame players.  Card depicts Walter Johnson and a partial name of Nap Lajoie on top.  Asking $500 OBO delivered:

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/t206hound/two-name/5958/t213-2-walter-johson[/IMG][IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/t206hound/two-name/5955/t213-2-walter-johson[/IMG][IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/t206hound/two-name/5956/t213-2-walter-johson[/IMG][IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/t206hound/two-name/5957/t213-2-walter-johson[/IMG]
lets try a lower price... feel free to make an offer...
Looking to move this card soon...
